prototypes.prototype: .SetItem as L (Source as B, ContentType as C, TargetPath as C)
.SetItem as L (Source as C, ContentType as C, TargetPath as C)
.SetItem as L (Source as System::IO::Stream, ContentType as C, TargetPath as C)

argument.name: Source
argument.description: The content to save in the item.

argument.name: TargetPath
argument.description: The name of the item to store the contents. EG, the name of a file in the Storage container.

page.description: Sets the contents of the specified item.
page.example:
dim CallResult as CallResult dim Container as A5Storage::DataContainer = null_value()
CallResult = A5Storage::DataContainer::Open(Container, "Provider='Disk';Container='c:\A5Webroot';") ? CallResult.Success = .T.
? Container.SetItem("<html><body>Hello World</body> </html>", "text/html", "MyPath/ MyItem.html") = .T.
